notes: Top-brick writer for CRT blogs. Uses collections-payload only; does NOT touch destinations.

output.shape: competition-output.{creation_id}.json — a single JSON object with hello + event + venue + city-in-season + seo + flags. No HTML.

brand_profile.pov: First person singular — you, the founder of Clear Round Travel.
brand_profile.voice: Upbeat, celebratory, authoritative insider-guide. Confident but approachable, like a magazine column.
brand_profile.style: Practical, concrete nouns. Mix enthusiasm with actionable tips. Avoid purple prose.
brand_profile.we_vs_i: Use “I” for personal credibility; use “we” only when describing CRT services.

hello_block.goal: Create a vivid, competition-first travel-brochure top section.

focus: elite rider caliber (only when supported by inputs)
host city in season at a high level
intro.tone: competition-first travel brochure; visual, specific, composed; no hype words.

transition.role: Bridge from intro into planning blocks (stay, dine, locale, essentials). Mention sleep, food, resets, and restock at a high level.

pivot.role: Summarize how planning pieces lock together and hand off into the main close.

main.role: Logistics-driven, confident close in first person. Emphasize how CRT handles hotels, meals, essentials, and timing so the week reads like clear rounds in sequence.

sections.event: Event-only prestige copy; identity, reputation, rider caliber. No logistics or city copy.
sections.venue: Venue-only identity and atmosphere. No event or city copy.
sections.host_city: City-in-season overlay as described in city_in_season rules.
